text: Marco Camenisch (born 21 January 1952) is a Swiss anarchist and environmental activist. He was born in Schiers. He served several years in prison for the 1989 murder of a border guard in Brusio, Switzerland and other offences. Camenisch has maintained his political ideas during his time in prison, and he has remained a political activist. ==References== == Other websites == *List of anarchists Category:Swiss activists Category:Environmentalists Category:Anarchists Category:Green anarchism Category:Green thinkers Category:Murderers Category:Prisoners Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Graub√ºnden
title: Marco Camenisch
